title: LoL files Scattered around.
body:
Hey People,

I recently bought a new SSD for my PC and i was looking to move my LoL files and other games onto this SSD for quicker loading times etc. However while i was transferring games over i realised my Riot games Folder is missing and all of my files for League of legends are scattered all around my Hard Drive not contained in a folder. Im wondering if there is a way i can locate the files and put them back into a folder ready for transfer. I'd rather not have to redownload it as my download speed quite poor at the moment and it would take a while to reinstall games.

Any help/guidance is appreciated!
Thankyou.

replies.body:
Seems like one of Ziggs bombs got left where it shouldn't have been =\ . 

The only solid way I can think of to get a safe, complete installation of League will be to get a fresh download. You could try transferring the files over, but you run the risk of missing some or some getting damaged in the process, which is a little harder to do especially since your files are scattered. I'd suggest letting that download run it's course to make sure League runs correctly.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XzZKzWEM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-13T22:34:29.961+0000)
>
> Seems like one of Ziggs bombs got left where it shouldn't have been =\ . 
> 
> The only solid way I can think of to get a safe, complete installation of League will be to get a fresh download. You could try transferring the files over, but you run the risk of missing some or some getting damaged in the process, which is a little harder to do especially since your files are scattered. I'd suggest letting that download run it's course to make sure League runs correctly.

I'll try this i guess,

Thanks
